name: Doppelgangers (Joll05)
description:
DOPPELGANGERS "Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else."
- Margaret Mead

In this game, made in about 3 hours for Trijam #174, you'll try to find the one person in the crowd that is identical to the one on stage. As you play, more and more people will join, making it harder and harder to find the duplicate. Try to put the spotlight on as many as you can before time runs out.

Feel free to post your high scores in the comments!

Known bugs/missing features
  • There is currently no music or sound effects in the game
  • The game is currently quite inaccessible to colorblind people.
  • Yes, I know the bands on the blue hats are slightly off center. By the time I noticed it it was too time consuming to fix.
